com.lukflug.panelstudio.component

Class ComponentBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Container, EmptySpace, FocusableComponent

    public abstract class ComponentBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements IComponent
    Base class for components.

      • handleButton

        public void handleButton(Context context,
                         int button)
        Description copied from interface: IComponent
        Should be called by the parent when a mouse button state changes. The current height of the component should be set by this method via Context.setHeight(int).
        Specified by:
        handleButton in interface IComponent
        Parameters:
        context - the Context for the component
        button - the button that changed its state
        See Also:
        Interface#LBUTTON, Interface#RBUTTON

      • handleKey

        Description copied from interface: IComponent

        Specified by:
        handleKey in interface IComponent
        Parameters:
        context - the Context for the component
        scancode - the scancode for the key that was typed

      • handleScroll

        public void handleScroll(Context context,
                         int diff)
        Description copied from interface: IComponent
        Should be called by the parent when the mouse wheel is scrolled. The current height of the component should be set by this method via Context.setHeight(int).
        Specified by:
        handleScroll in interface IComponent
        Parameters:
        context - the Context for the component
        diff - the amount by which the wheel was moved
